Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is encrusted with a yellow-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of a red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394729) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394729)
